title: The Spindle's Heir
premise: At the elite Arcanum Finis academy, where the children of fairy tale legends train to control their inherited magic, Lyra is the only student whose legacy is a curse: she is the direct descendant of Sleeping Beauty. When a mysterious blight begins petrifying students mid-spell, Lyra must master her dormant, time-altering magic—the very power that cursed her bloodline—to unravel a conspiracy that seeks to trap the entire magical world in an eternal stasis.
protagonist: Lyra Thorn, a seventeen-year-old "Legacy" student grappling with a magical inheritance she fears is more a weapon than a gift.
conflict: Lyra must overcome institutional prejudice and her own deep-seated fear of her power to stop a hidden enemy who is weaponizing the classic fairy tale curses, turning the academy's greatest strengths into vulnerabilities, before everyone she loves is frozen in time forever.
setting: The present-day, hidden Arcanum Finis Academy, a sprawling gothic university built around the original enchanted spindle, where the magical descendants of classic tales (like Beast's grandson or Cinderella's great-niece) are educated.
tone: Atmospheric, suspenseful, and character-driven, blending academic intrigue with gothic mystery and the looming dread of an inevitable, waking curse.
